questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In ten years, I would like visit many country in the world to meet many people and speak, change ideas between us. The first land to visit is the America of south : deserts, mountains, cities and seas with different transports : aeroplane, auto, car, bike and boat. For that, I would like learn spanish and englih language. It is most aisy to meet people if you understand their language.
